author: pipermerriam
content: Here's my WIP document describing the approach I'm investigating: https://notes.ethereum.org/YtI7e-R5RSK13cklq8j3Ug?view

author: pipermerriam
content: Anyone with some graphviz-foo able to get this rendered into something sane?  I've had `dot -Tsvg -o graph.svg graph.dot` running in a terminal using 100% CPU for about 15 minutes....  It's a pretty huge graph with 1024 nodes, each with between 15-40 edges to the other nodes on the graph.
